attributes.comment:
I would like to encourage the USCIS to reconsider raising the rates for adoption
related expenses. The enormous expense related to adoption would only be
compounded by raising the rates by 66%. I feel that the government should
consider the financial hardship already endured by parents wishing to adopt, and
should not make the burden more difficult. The American people have always
been kind and generous, and by imposing these additional fees, will make it more
difficult for kind, caring people to adopt orphans. To care for those that are too
weak to care for themselves has always been the cornerstone of our American
traditions. I humbly ask that the proposed fee increase not be instituted. Thank
you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Cindy Maust
